SEARCH
Package uiclasses

Class EmployeeUI

java.lang.Object
uiclasses.UserUI
uiclasses.EmployeeUI
Direct Known Subclasses:
ManagerUI, TeacherUI
public class EmployeeUI extends UserUI
The EmployeeUI class represents the user interface for an employee user. It provides methods for viewing and sending messages, managing research roles, and other employee-specific actions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs an EmployeeUI instance.

    Constructs an EmployeeUI instance with the specified employee user.

      Parameters:

    • researchersMenu

      Displays the researcher-specific menu for managing research-related actions.

    • main

      public void main()
      The main method for the employee user interface. It provides a menu for various actions such as viewing news, changing passwords, and managing messages.
